publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2393 Bashir Ahmad: Congratulating Pakistan and India on 61 Years of Independence—That the Parliament congratulates India and Pakistan on the 61st anniversary of their independence from British rule; applauds both countries for their many successes over the last 61 years, including India on becoming the world’s second fastest growing economy and Pakistan for its flourishing research institutes; notes and celebrates the extensive contribution of Indians and Pakistanis living in Scotland; applauds the significant steps both countries have taken in working closer with one another, and wishes them both continued success in the years to come. Supported by: Elaine Murray*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Alasdair Allan*, Ken Macintosh*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-2393Congratulating Pakistan and India on 61 Years of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-2393 Congratulating Pakistan and India on 61 Years of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2008) Ian McKee*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-2393 Congratulating Pakistan and India on 61 Years of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2393 Congratulating Pakistan and India on 61 Years of Independence (lodged on 14 August 2008) Angela Constance*
